topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Installation Overview

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade 1.1: Installation Overivew

body.p: This document describes the process for installing HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in a baremetal environment in the Non-KVM region.

section.title: About the installation
section.p: The HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation installs HP Helion Lifecycle Management, creates a base HP Helion OpenStack cloud, and configures network virtualization through HP Distributed Cloud Networking. Using a separate installation, you integrate KVM servers into the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment.
After installation, you can interact with the HP Helion OpenStack cloud using the Horizon graphical interface or using the CLIs of the respective services.

section.title: Installation process
section.p: Use the following process to install HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade in a baremetal environment.

ol.li: Review the Technical Overview for information on the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment.
Review the Support Matrix to make sure your environment meets the minimum requirements.
Perform any required or optional Installation Prerequisites.
Install the non-KVM region controller-0 and configure a temporary IP address on an accessible interface, preferably PXE
